text-align: center;" |'''<span class="fn org">Hanga</span>'''<br /> '''हंगा''' |- |- <tr class="mergedtoprow"> <td colspan=2 style="text-align: center; background-color: <nowiki>#FFFFFF</nowiki>">—  '''<span class="category">village</span>'''  —</td> </tr> |- |- |- |- |- | '''[[Geographic coordinate system|Coordinates]]''' | |- |- class=mergedrow | | '''Country''' | | [[India]] |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow | | '''[[States and territories of India|State]]''' | | [[Maharashtra]] |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow | | '''[[Districts of India|District(s)]]''' | | [[Ahmadnagar district|Ahmadnagar]] |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow | | '''[[14th Lok Sabha|Parliamentary constituency]]''' | | [[Ahmednagar (Lok Sabha constituency)|Ahmednagar]] |- class=mergedrow | | '''[[Vidhan Sabha|Assembly constituency]]''' | | [[Parner]] |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- style="white-space: nowrap" |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow | | '''[[Time zone]]''' | | [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] ([[UTC+05:30]]) |- style="white-space: nowrap" |- class=mergedrow style="white-space: nowrap" |- style="white-space: nowrap" |- |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- class=mergedrow |- | colspan=2 | <div class="NavFrame collapsed" style="border:none;padding:0;"> <div class="NavHead" style="font-size:105%; background:transparent;" align="left">'''Codes'''</div> <ul class="NavContent" style="list-style: none; margin-left: 0; text-align:left; font-size:105%; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; line-height: inherit"><li style="line-height: inherit; margin: 0"> {| |- |- | style="width: 85px" | • [[Communications in India|Telephone]] | • +022488 |- |- | style="width: 85px" | • [[Indian licence plates|Vehicle]] | • MH-16,17 |} </li></ul> </div> |- |- |- |- |- |} '''Hanga''' ({{lang-mr|हंगा}}), is a [[village]] in [[Parner taluka]] in [[Ahmednagar district]] of state of [[Maharashtra]], it is popular for temple of lord [[Shiva]] namely as Hangeshwar. It is situated at the bank of Hanga river. In the August Hindu month [[Shravan]] every Monday in hangeshwar temple round shape pindi of rice are become. for details contact to Devendra Kulkarni [[India]].<ref>[http://www.gloriousindia.com/unleashed/place.php?id=4099 Villages in Parner taluka-Glorious India]</ref> ==Religion== The majority of the population in the village is [[Hindu]]. ==Economy== The majority of the population has farming as their primary occupation. ==See also== * [[Parner taluka]] * [[Villages in Parner taluka]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Parner tehsil topics}} {{coord missing|Maharashtra}} [[Category:Villages in Parner taluka]] [[Category:Villages in Ahmednagar district]]
